sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-card
    shaped
    elevation="24">
    <v-form
      @submit.prevent="onSubmit"
      class="pa-4">
      <v-row
        justify="center"
       >
        <v-col
          align="center"
          :cols="6">
          <v-text-field
            v-model="newScenario"
            label="Enter the client's name"
            hide-details
            text-align="center"/>
          <v-select
            @input="riskProfile = $event"
            v-model="riskProfile"
            :items="riskProfiles"
            label="Select a risk profile"
            item-value="id"
            item-text="name"/>
          <v-btn
            type="submit"
            align="center"
            color="deep-purple accent-4"
            dense large dark>
            Begin
          </v-btn>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-form>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service";

export default {
  name: "AddScenario",
  data() {
    return {
      newScenario: null,
      riskProfile: "",
      error: null,
      user: null
    };
  },
  props: {
    requestUser: {},
    riskProfiles: {
      type: Array,
      required: true,
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onSubmit() {
      if (this.newScenario) {
        let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "POST", {
          client: this.newScenario,
          risk_profile_id: this.riskProfile,
          user: this.requestUser
        }).then(data => {
          this.$emit("add-scenario", data);
          this.newScenario = null;
        });
        if (this.error) {
          this.error = null;
        }
      } else {
        this.error = "You must enter a name for the scenario";
      }
    }
  }
};
</script>
